detectors.description:

	- router.addLiquidityETH{value: bnbAmount}(address(this),tokenAmount,0,0,devWallet,block.timestamp) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c1890ea3b9cec8b5fc3382a8d274f2395fd28d64_CA.sol#553-560)

CA.swapForFees() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c1890ea3b9cec8b5fc3382a8d274f2395fd28d64_CA.sol#501-533) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- unitBalance = deltaBalance / (denominator - sellTaxes.liquidity) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c1890ea3b9cec8b5fc3382a8d274f2395fd28d64_CA.sol#515)
